How to cite ClusterGB¶

If you use ClusterGB, please make the appropriate citations. Bibtex entries are provided in the hyperlinks for your convenience.

Any usage¶

  • Lee and Choi, MSMSE 12 (2004)
  • Huber et al., in preparation (2018)

Bond orientational order¶

  • Steinhardt, Nelson, and Ronchetti, PRB 28 (1983)

Fermi-smoothed coordination number¶

  • Huang et al., PSSB 252 (2015)

Voronoi analysis by Voro++¶

  • Whatever Voro++ tells you

Or (as of writing these docs):

  • Rycroft, Chaos 19 (2009)
